document.full_text: the huffington post unfairly pocketed more than $100 million from its unpaid bloggers when aol inc bought the influential news website in february, according to a lawsuit filed on tuesday.
document.title: aol and huffington post sued by unpaid bloggers
lines_and_colors: the huffington post unfairly pocketed more than $100 million from its unpaid bloggers when aol inc bought the influential news website in february, according to a lawsuit filed on tuesday.
